attributes.action: Proposed Traveller & Gypsy site - Kiveton Park, Sheffield
attributes.additional_details: We on the Kiveton Park Station Action Group FB page believe the site situated at the bottom of Dog Kennel Hill, Kiveton Park S26 is unfit for anyone to reside on these premises. This site is on an unused Quarry right beside a Railway line and adjacent to a Canal.It has limited access, there are many more reasons posted on our FB page. If you care - please share!
